application.ref: GROBID - A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents

biblStruct.note: D a n i e l L i n Address: 101 NW 23rd Street, Corvallis, OR, 97330 Github: github.com/power10dan

div.head: O r e g o n S t a t e U n i v e r s i t y : ( C o r v a l l i s , O R ) , S e p t . 2 0 1 5 -P r e s e n t : D o c t o r a t e o f P h i l o s o p h y i n C o m p u t e r S c i e n c e .
Focus: Software Engineering / Human Computer Interaction
div.p: Major advisor: Dr. Christopher Scaffidi

div.head: O r e g o n S t a t e U n i v e r s i t y : ( C o r v a l l i s , O R ) , J u n e 2 0 1 1 -2 0 1 5 : B a c h e l o r o f S c i e n c e i n C o m p u t e r S c i e n c e .
div.p: Minor in Physics GPA: 3.36 Experience:

div.head: O r e g o n S t a t e U n i v e r s i t y : ( C o r v a l l i s , O R ) , S e p t . 2 0 1 5 - P r e s e n t : G r a d u a t e R e s e a r c h A s s i s t a n t
div.p: • Developed a website using Javascript and ReactJS to help with disaster planning and evacuation.
• Design and conducted an observational study and semi-structured interview to observe people's search strategies on search engines and and examine their attitudes towards searching for information.
• Experience with SCRUM software development process.
• Developed an Android application to retrieve data from StackOverflow using Volley API

div.head: R o b e r t B o s c h R e s e a r c h a n d Te c h n o l o g y C e n t e r : ( P i t t s b u r g h , PA ) , J u n e 2 0 1 5 -S e p t 2 0 1 5 : R e s e a r c h I n t e r n
div.p: • Implemented a client-server symmetric searchable encryption scheme using MIRACL cryptography API and 0MQ networking API using C/C++.
• Debugged and fixed logic errors in existing searchable encryption code base.

div.head: T-D a n B u b b l e Te a S h o p : ( C o r v a l l i s , O R ) , J u n e 2 0 1 4 - S e p t 2 0 1 4 : M o b i l e D e v e l o p e r ,
div.p: • Developed and designed an android application interface using Android and Java that allows customers to browse, select, and order bubble tea.
• Collaborated with three students and used Git version control.
• Solicited requirements from the client and used extreme programming software development process to create the android app.

div.head: O r e g o n S t a t e U n i v e r s i t y : ( C o r v a l l i s , O R ) , J u n e 2 0 1 3 - J u n e 2 0 1 5 : U n d e r g r a d u a t e R e s e a r c h A s s i s t a n t
div.p: • Developed a user interface to allow scientists to interface with the line detection algorithm.
• Used Git version control.
• Created software documentation for the code on Github.
• Co-authored a publication at SoftMatter.
Publications Languages:
• Javascript
• Java
• Python

figure.figDesc: : Christopher A.R. Jones, Long Liang, Daniel Lin, Yang Jiao, and Bo Sun. The spatial-temporal characteristics of type I collagen-based extracellular matrix. Soft Matter, 10(44), 8855-8863 (2014) Frameworks: • ReactJS • Redux • Material-UI • Django RESTful API
